How do I place an order?: How do I place an order?
To place an order, browse the menu, add: To place an order, browse the menu, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout.
Yes, you can track your delivery in real: Yes, you can track your delivery in real-time from the orders section.

We accept credit cards, debit cards, and: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal.

onboarding_title_1: Welcome to the Food Delivery App!
onboarding_desc_1: Craving something delicious? Order your favorite meals and we’ll deliver them hot and fresh—right to your door!
onboarding_title_2: Discover the Best Restaurants Near You
onboarding_desc_2: Browse top-rated eateries, explore new cuisines, and find your next favorite meal—all in one place!
onboarding_title_3: Delicious Meals, Just a Tap Away
onboarding_desc_3: Order from your favorite restaurants and enjoy fast delivery—your next meal is only a tap away!
